void '''CopyFriendliness''' (Actor ''other'', bool ''changeTarget'' [, bool ''resetHealth''])
==Usage== Changes the calling actor's affiliation to match that of the specified actor, which includes befriending, hating and targeting the same actors the specified actor does.
===Parameters=== *''other'': a pointer to the actor to affiliate with. *''changeTarget'': if ''true'', the calling actor changes its target to match that of the specified actor, provided that this target does not have the {{Flag|NOTARGET}} and {{Flag|NEVERTARGET}} flags. Otherwise, if ''false'', the calling actor keeps its current target, if any. *''resetHealth'': if ''true'', the calling actor's health is set back to the value it spawned with, otherwise its health remains unchanged. Default is ''true''.
